quote: The less you want, the richer you are. The more you need in order to be happy, the more miserable you'll be. – Yanni
fact: The only two days of the year in which there are no professional sports games--MLB, NBA, NHL, or NFL--are the day before and the day after the Major League All-Star Game.
joke: Why does Norway have barcodes on their battleships? So when they get back to port, they can Scandinavian.
